#include<iostream>
using namespace std;


int reverse_num(int a)
{
	int b = 0;
	int factor = 1;
	int rem;
	
	do
	{
		rem = a % 10;
		a = a / 10;
		b = b * 10 + rem;
	} while (a != 0);
	return b;
}

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);

	int N, num1, num2;
	cin >> N;
	for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
	{
		cin >> num1 >> num2;
		cout << (reverse_num(reverse_num(num1) + reverse_num(num2))) << endl;
	}

}
